title: And Women Must Weep
credit_line_repro: By permission of Plattsburgh State Art Museum, Rockwell Kent Gallery and Collection
description: Young woman leans against doorway of house, with her right hand pressed to her head in gesture of sorrow and grief. Her bare, right foot rests on doorstep while other is on ground. A man, seen through picket-fence on right, walks away behind an American flag.
restrictions: all requests should be directed to The Plattsburgh State Art Museum, 101 Broad St., Plattsburgh, NY  12901
name: Print
